titles: Commune consilium tentum in camera Guild-hall civitatis London undecimo die Julii, anno Dom. 1612 ...
author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
notes: Text begins: Whereas the Company of Painter-stainers have been an antient brotherhood in this city ... [Act requiring membership in the company].
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library (London, England)
